metadata.title: CVE-2024-5690 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: By monitoring the time certain operations take, an attacker could haveguessed which external protocol handlers were functional on a user'ssystem. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127 and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
